Rulings.Edison:
●If this card is face-down on the field, it can be destroyed by effects that destroy Spell Cards.
●When you activate this card, the opponent can chain a card like Magic Jammer that will negate its activation and destroy it.
●If you equip this card to Freed the Matchless General, Ryu Senshi or to a Warrior-Type monster you control when you have Frontier Wiseman on the field, it is negated and destroyed.
●If you equip this card to Gearfried the Iron Knight it is not destroyed.
●This card is not destroyed by cards that target, like Mystical Space Typhoon or Dust Tornado, or by cards that don't target, like Heavy Storm, Harpie’s Feather Duster, or Gryphon Wing.
●If a monster equipped with this card is flipped face-down, or removed from the field, this card is destroyed.
●This card can be sent from your hand or your Deck to the GY by the effect of Confiscation, Delinquent Duo, etc.
●If Imperial Order is active, this card can be destroyed by Dust Tornado, etc.
●This card can be returned to the owner’s hand by the effect of Giant Trunade or ‘Tornado Bird.
●If the monster this card is equipped to has its Type changed to anything but Warrior-Type, this card is destroyed.
●If the opponent chains Mystical Space Typhoon to the activation of this card, this card is destroyed before its effect can be applied.

Rulings.Goat:
●If this card is face-down on the field, it can be destroyed by effects that destroy Spell Cards.
●When you activate this card, the opponent can chain a card like Magic Jammer that will negate its activation and destroy it.
●If you equip this card to Freed the Matchless General, Ryu Senshi or to a Warrior monster you control when you have Frontier Wiseman on the field, it is negated and destroyed.
●If you equip this card to Gearfried the Iron Knight it is not destroyed.
●This card is not destroyed by cards that target, like Mystical Space Typhoon or Dust Tornado, or by cards that do not target, like Heavy Storm, Harpie’s Feather Duster, or Gryphon Wing.
●If a monster equipped with this card is Set, or removed from the field, this card is destroyed.
●This card can be sent from your hand or your Deck to the GY by the effect of Confiscation, Delinquent Duo, etc.
●If Imperial Order is applying, this card can be destroyed by Dust Tornado, etc.
●This card can be returned to the owner’s hand by the effect of Giant Trunade or ‘Tornado Bird.
●If the monster this card is equipped to has its Type changed to anything but Warrior, this card is destroyed.
●If the opponent chains Mystical Space Typhoon to the activation of this card, this card is destroyed before its effect can be applied.
●Q: The effect of “Fusion Sword Murasame Blade” says that it can't be destroyed by cards that destroy Spell cards, is this true for “Heavy Storm” and “Harpie’s Feather Duster?” 
A: “Fusion Sword Murasame Blade” cannot be destroyed by “Heavy Storm,” “Harpie's Feather Duster,” “Mystical Space Typhoon,” “De-Spell,” “Dust Tornado,” “Armed Ninja,” “Gryphon Wing,” and similar effects. Nor is it destroyed if equipped to “Gearfried the Iron Knight.” It can be returned to hand (“Giant Trunade”), or negated (“Imperial Order,” “Freed the Matchless General),” or sent to the GY (“Emergency Provisions”).   
●Q: If I equip “Fusion Sword Murasame Blade” to “Spirit Reaper,” would “Spirit Reaper” be destroyed or would this be an illegal activation? 
A: You wouldn't even be able to target him with it at all. “Spirit Reaper” is not a Warrior. It would be an illegal activation in this case. If “Spirit Reaper” were turned into a Warrior through “DNA Surgery”, equipping “Fusion Sword Masamune Blade” to “Spirit Reaper” would cause “Spirit Reaper” to destroy itself through its effect.

Rulings.Cat:

● If you equip this card to 'Freed the Matchless General', 'Ryu Senshi' or to a Warrior you control when you have 'Frontier Wiseman' on the field, it is negated and destroyed.
● If you equip this card to 'Gearfried the Iron Knight' it isn't destroyed.
● This card isn't destroyed by cards that target, like 'Mystical Space Typhoon' or 'Dust Tornado', or by cards that do not target, like 'Heavy Storm', 'Harpie’s Feather Duster', or 'Gryphon Wing'.
● If a monster equipped with this card is flipped face-down, or removed from the field, this card is destroyed.
● This card can be sent from your hand or your Deck to the GY by the effect of 'Confiscation', 'Delinquent Duo', etc.
● If 'Imperial Order' is applying, this card can be destroyed by 'Dust Tornado', etc.
● This card can be returned to the owner’s hand by the effect of 'Giant Trunade' or ‘Tornado Bird'.
● If the monster this card is equipped to has its Type changed to anything but Warrior-Type, this card is destroyed.
● If the opponent chains 'Mystical Space Typhoon' to the activation of this card, this card is destroyed before its effect can be applied.

Rulings.Base:
1. If this card is face-down on the field, it can be destroyed by effects that destroy Spell Cards.
2. When you activate this card, the opponent can chain a card like "Magic Jammer" that will negate its activation and destroy it.
3. If you equip this card to "Freed the Matchless General", "Ryu Senshi" or to a Warrior-Type monster you control when you have "Frontier Wiseman" on the field, it is negated and destroyed.
4. If you equip this card to "Gearfried the Iron Knight" it is not destroyed.
5. This card is not destroyed by cards that target, like "Mystical Space Typhoon" or "Dust Tornado", or by cards that do not target, like "Heavy Storm", "Harpie's Feather Duster", or "Gryphon Wing".
6. If a monster equipped with this card is flipped face-down, or removed from the field, this card is destroyed.
7. This card can be sent from your hand or your Deck to the GY by the effect of "Confiscation", "Delinquent Duo", etc.
8. If "Imperial Order" is active, this card can be destroyed by "Dust Tornado", etc.
9. This card can be returned to the owner's hand by the effect of "Giant Trunade" or "Tornado Bird".
10. If the monster this card is equipped to has its Type changed to anything but Warrior-Type, this card is destroyed.
11. If the opponent chains "Mystical Space Typhoon" to the activation of this card, this card is destroyed before its effect can be applied.
